resources.string:
We are a world leader in the rapidly changing environment
of communications technology – by providing
hardware, software, and services to enable the full value of connectivity.


Founded: 1876.
Parent company: Telefonaktiebolaget LM Ericsson (publ).
Company registration number: 556016-0680.
Global headquarters: Stockholm, Sweden.
President and CEO: Börje Ekholm.
Chairman of The Board: Ronnie Leten.
Net sales, Q1 2023: SEK 62.6 billion.
EBIT, Q1 2023: SEK 3.0 billion.


Net sales full year 2022: SEK 271.5 billion.
EBIT, Full year 2022: SEK 27 billion.


Listed: Nasdaq Stockholm and on NASDAQ in New York.


Number of employees worldwide:

South East Asia, Oceania and India: 27,981.
North East Asia: 13,136.
North America: 11,765.
Europe and Latin America: 47,500*.
Middle East and Africa: 4,549.

Total: 104,931.

* of which Sweden: 14,384.
(numbers from the latest interim report Q1 2023).


Gender breakdown (Dec 31, 2022):

Female 26%
Male 74%.
